title: Deadeye/ Jhin worth?
body:
Hey guys, is the new champion (Deadeye/ Jhinworth) it buying with RP? As in the bundle. And how much does the bundle cost (Skin and champ) ? TY!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: -_- I meant like the bundle prices... Im pretty sure that all new released champs are the same...

Bundle price will most likely be the same as previous recent releases; 975 RP (1350 RP after the first week) for the skin alone, or 1462 RP (normally 1950 RP) with the champ launch bundle.

Actual prices should be announced while the alternate skin is being touched up on the PBE. Keep an eye on PBE changes at [Surrender@20.net](http://www.surrenderat20.net/).
I just want to know if jhin is any good, not another bard screw up or something.

Unfortunately not, when they introduced the new sales schedule ( more sales more often) they took away on release discounts as of the start of 2016. So when any skin is released it doesn't go on sale straight away. So the bundle will be more like 1837 rp.
Reference
https://twitter.com/RiotKateyKhaos/status/689955771614904320
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/were-changing-discounts

There is very little information on the new champion. We only know bits and pieces, and the mechanics and gameplay haven't been announced yet. Once the Champion Spotlight is released, they should also release the price of the bundle. I would recommend watching the Spotlight when it is released and deciding yourself if you think that it is a worthwhile investment to pay for and play that champion.
